About meResources

GIS and geostatistics

How to handle geographic data.

Geographic Information Systems (GIS) is the discipline which handles geographic data. When I first approached this discipline, few years ago, I had to learn myself how to manipulate GIS data, and I couldnâ€™t find many resources to do this in Python. Since that time, I decided to dive in the topic, and here I will share some basic knowledge about it.


Have fun!

Stippe

What will we talk about
Opinions are mine, mistakes too, and if you find any feel free to report it via mail or via Twitter Bluesky
Most of the material in the statistics section is an adaptation to Python of some pre-existing model.
I have tried to provide the necessary credits, but if you think that a relevant contribution is missing, please let me know.
No AI were harmed in creating this blog.
This is a blog, not a bakery: there are no cookies here!
